alert.note: Alert for Butts; Greene; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:42PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oconee, Morgan, southeastern Henry, southeastern Walton, northwestern Greene, northeastern Butts, southwestern Oglethorpe, northern Jasper and Newton Counties through 715 PM EST... At 641 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near North High Shoals to Brick Store to near Locust Grove, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Covington, Madison, Social Circle, Porterdale, Rutledge, Newborn, North High Shoals, Mansfield, Bostwick, Good Hope, Shady Dale, Bishop, Maxeys, Buckhead, Stephens, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Ola and Worthville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for northeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Greene; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Walton
